alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 3:54AM CST until February 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...STEADY SNOW EXITING EASTERN WISCONSNIN... .The main snow band with a fast moving storm system was exiting eastern Wisconsin early this morning. Scattered snow showers and freezing drizzle and drizzle lingered in its wake. The snow showers could result in another couple inches of snow in portions of the Lake Superior snowbelt, mainly this afternoon. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...A wintry mix of scattered snow showers and some freezing drizzle and drizzle. Little additional snow accumulation is expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
